attributes.name: sequenceNr
attributes.label: Sequence number
attributes.description: Number that defines order of attributes in a entity

attributes.name: mappedBy
attributes.label: Mapped by
attributes.description: Attribute in the referenced entity that owns the relationship of a onetomany attribute

attributes.name: orderBy
attributes.label: Order by
attributes.description: Order expression that defines entity collection order of a onetomany attribute (e.g. "attr0", "attr0,ASC", "attr0,DESC" or "attr0,ASC;attr1,DESC"

attributes.name: expression
attributes.label: Expression
attributes.description: Computed value expression in Magma JavaScript

refEntity.name: sys_md_Tag
refEntity.label: Tag
refEntity.description: Semantic tags that can be applied to entities, attributes and other data

items.name: start
items.label: Start nucleotide
items.description: Comma-separated attribute names

items.name: chromosome
items.label: Chromosome
items.description: Comma-separated attribute names

items.name: ref
items.label: Reference base(s)
items.description: Comma-separated attribute names

items.name: alt
items.label: Alternate base(s)
items.description: Comma-separated attribute names

items.name: identifier
items.label: Identifier
items.description: Comma-separated attribute names

items.name: stop
items.label: End nucleotide
items.description: Comma-separated attribute names

items.name: description
items.label: Description
items.description: Comma-separated attribute names

items.name: patient_id
items.label: Patient identifier
items.description: Comma-separated attribute names

items.name: name
items.label: Name
items.description: Comma-separated attribute names

items.name: linkout
items.label: Link out
items.description: Comma-separated attribute names

items.name: agg_distinct_overrides
items.label: Distinct attribute overrides
items.description: JSON object that maps entity names to attribute names

items.name: gb_init_sources
items.label: Sources
items.defaultValue: [{name:'Genome',twoBitURI:'//www.biodalliance.org/datasets/hg19.2bit',tier_type: 'sequence'},{name: 'Genes',desc: 'Gene structures from GENCODE 19',bwgURI: '//www.biodalliance.org/datasets/gencode.bb',stylesheet_uri: '//www.biodalliance.org/stylesheets/gencode.xml',collapseSuperGroups: true,trixURI:'//www.biodalliance.org/datasets/geneIndex.ix'},{name: 'Repeats',desc: 'Repeat annotation from Ensembl 59',bwgURI: '//www.biodalliance.org/datasets/repeats.bb',stylesheet_uri: '//www.biodalliance.org/stylesheets/bb-repeats.xml'},{name: 'Conservation',desc: 'Conservation',bwgURI: '//www.biodalliance.org/datasets/phastCons46way.bw',noDownsample: true}]

items.name: reports_entities
items.label: Reports
items.description: Comma-seperated report strings (e.g. MyDataSet:myreport,OtherDataSet:otherreport). The report name refers to an existing FreemarkerTemplate entity or file with name view-<report>-entitiesreport.ftl (e.g. view-myreport-entitiesreport.ftl)

items.name: expirationDate
items.label: Expiration date
items.description: When expiration date is null it will never expire

items.name: indexActionGroup
items.description: The group that this index action belongs to

items.name: actionOrder
items.description: The order in which the action is registered within its IndexActionJob

items.name: entityFullName
items.description: The full name of the entity that needs to be indexed.

items.name: entityId
items.description: Filled when only one row of the entity "entityFullName" is indexed

items.name: indexStatus
items.description: The status of index action

items.name: indexActionJobID
items.description: ID of the IndexActionJob that contains the group of IndexActions that this index job execution will index.

items.name: size
items.label: Size
items.description: File size in bytes

items.name: url
items.label: URL
items.description: File download URL

items.name: id
items.description: automatically generated internal id, only for internal use.

items.name: notify
items.description: Boolean to indicate whether or not to send an email on job completion

items.name: targetName
items.label: target name
items.description: Fully qualified name of the entity that is being annotated.

items.name: title
items.label: Application title
items.description: Displayed in browser toolbar.

items.name: signup_moderation
items.label: Sign up moderation
items.description: Admins must accept sign up requests before account activation

items.name: google_sign_in
items.label: Enable Google Sign-In
items.description: Enable users to sign in with their existing Google account

items.name: google_app_client_id
items.label: Google app client ID
items.description: Google app client ID used during Google Sign-In

items.name: logo_href_navbar
items.label: Logo in navigation bar
items.description: HREF to logo image used instead of home plugin label

items.name: logo_href_top
items.label: Logo above navigation bar
items.description: HREF to logo image

items.name: molgenis_menu
items.label: Menu
items.description: JSON object that describes menu content.

items.name: language_code
items.label: Language code
items.description: ISO 639 alpha-2 or alpha-3 language code.

items.name: bootstrap_theme
items.label: Bootstrap theme
items.description: CSS file name of theme (see molgenis-core-ui/src/main/resources/css/themes).

items.name: css_href
items.label: CSS href
items.description: CSS file name to add custom CSS (see molgenis-core-ui/src/main/resources/css).
